text: 14.6 1 Ko 10.31, Gal 4.10, 1 Ti 4.3 Binɨb kɨli ñɨn olap ñɨn awl ak mɨdeb agɨl, kɨli Bɨawl ak nop gos nɨŋɨd anɨgɨpal. Pen binɨb tap ñɨŋeb monmon ñɨbal okok, kɨli Bɨawl ak nop gos nɨŋɨd, God nop tep agɨl ñɨbal. Pen binɨb chag tap yɨpɨl ma ñɨbal okok, kɨli Bɨawl ak nop gos nɨŋɨd, kas tap okok dɨl God nop tep agɨl ñɨbal.
